description:
Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref. 2373/APP/2019/3747, dated 07/04/2020, in order to amend the application description to:

Variation of Conditions 14 (Permitted Timeline) and 15 (Phasing) of planning permission Ref: 2373/APP/2005/2815 dated 12/12/2006 (Extraction of sand and gravel; backfilling (including fresh water lagoon) with inert waste; use of land for the recycling of inert construction and demolition waste and retention of temporary buildings for a period of 10 years; restoration of land to agricultural/wildlife habitat) to amend the permitted timeline and phasing of works for completion.
decision_conditions: The description of development of planning permission 2373/APP/2019/3747 is amended to the following:

"Variation of Conditions 14 (Permitted Timeline) and 15 (Phasing) of planning permission Ref: 2373/APP/2005/2815 dated 12/12/2006 (Extraction of sand and gravel; backfilling (including fresh water lagoon) with inert waste; use of land for the recycling of inert construction and demolition waste and retention of temporary buildings for a period of 10 years; restoration of land to agricultural/wildlife habitat) to amend the permitted timeline and phasing of works for completion."
